{"id":540042505,"lang":"cpp","time":"8Â months","timestamp":1629228352,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/540042505/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Rectangle Area","memory":"6.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int area(vector<int> const& r) {\n        return (r[2] - r[0]) * (r[3] - r[1]);\n    }\n    \n    int overlap(vector<int> const& r1, vector<int> const& r2) {\n        return max(0, -1 * (max(r1[0], r2[0]) - min(r1[2], r2[2]))) * max(0, -1 * (max(r1[1], r2[1]) - min(r1[3], r2[3])));    \n    }\n    \n    int computeArea(int ax1, int ay1, int ax2, int ay2, int bx1, int by1, int bx2, int by2) {\n        vector<int> r1{ax1, ay1, ax2, ay2};\n        vector<int> r2{bx1, by1, bx2, by2};\n        return area(r1) + area(r2) - overlap(r1, r2);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"rectangle-area"}
